description.narrative: Staff Salaries Humanitarian and Field Coordination, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 6:The country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards within the priorities for affected populations in achieving results for children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Staff Salaries Humanitarian and Field Coordination

description.narrative: Cross cutting functions were implemented and monitored by a high caliber of staff and consultants deployed in the main office in Khartoum and in 6 field offices and 5 sub-offices across Sudan. Diverse and changing needs in the country required a team of diverse backgrounds including both national and international staff. International staff came from both and those from programme and industrialised countries. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:18/01/2022
